Text: The #GOPTaxPlan would have a devastating impact on #NewMexico. It will raise taxes for hundreds of thousands of working New Mexicans, drive up health care premiums and cost our state hundreds of millions of dollars. I'm voting no.https://youtu.be/k7oO9ZQ-iqQ

Americans don’t want a tax bill written in secret, cobbled together at the last minute & filled with goodies for special interests. But that’s what we're going to get unless we can defeat the #GOPTaxScam today.
 
Time is running out—call your Senators now & tell them to vote no.

Let’s be very clear:
 
No middle-class family is demanding permanent tax cuts for corporations. They aren’t demanding a bill that drives up their health care premiums. They certainly aren’t demanding a tax INCREASE.

This #GOPTaxScam is a terrible deal for everyone except the 1%.

This is what happens when you attempt to subvert regular order. GOP leaders think they can reverse decades of bipartisan agreement to protect our #ArcticRefuge without the American people noticing. Raise your voices and let them know they won’t get away with it. #ProtectTheArctic

Yesterday, the Senate Parliamentarian ruled that the arctic drilling rider violates budget reconciliation rules—but the GOP has already drafted a new attempt to loot our #ArcticRefuge in order to pay for tax cuts for corporations and the ultra-wealthy.https://twitter.com/dcexaminer/status/936048662223998976 …

The #ArcticRefuge has sustained the Gwich’in people for centuries. It’s home to an incredible array of wildlife including caribou, wolves and polar bears. Drilling would have a devastating impact on the Gwich’in people, their way of life, and this unparalleled natural wonder.pic.twitter.com/bPUGrI3nnJ

.@SenSchumer @SenatorCantwell @SenMarkey @SenBennetCO @MartinHeinrich and I will be joined by Gwich'in Tribal leaders, @LCVoters and advocates to call on GOP leadership to give up this shameful attempt to sneak #ArcticRefuge drilling past the American people in their tax bill.

.@SenateDems are fighting back against the #GOPTaxScam drilling provision that hands our #ArcticRefuge—one of the last truly untouched places on earth—over to the fossil fuel industry.

#GOPTaxScam will help corporations & the ultra wealthy & leave working Americans out to dry. It repeals the state and local tax deduction, a key provision for middle-class families, but reduces the estate tax - a tax break only 30 NM families are wealthy enough to benefit from.
The #GOPTaxScam treats corporations better than people. Corporations receive the only permanent tax cut while 1 in 3 working New Mexicans will see their taxes go UP by 2027.

"The only way anything ever changes in Washington is when people stand up & demand it. So speak out, post on social media, write letters to the editor, & get everyone you know to help make sure Dourson is never confirmed to this position." @SenGillibrandhttp://www.timesunion.com/opinion/article/Commentary-Trump-s-EPA-nominee-wrong-choice-for-12370301.php …

“When Dourson delivers for his industry clients, it is the public who pays, through weakened health protections. "Dourson's record suggests that when there is doubt, he does not err on the side of caution in questions of human safety. He errs on the side of what his clients want. That makes him unsuitable to be the people’s lead protector from chemical pollution."https://www.wvgazettemail.com/opinion/gazette_opinion/editorial/gazette-editorial-industry-s-dourson-has-wrong-attitude-for-epa/article_5b14a53e-53c9-5b7e-8653-fa3de954d29c.html …

"Dourson isn’t just your run of the mill chemical company apologist. "Dourson has already taken up residence at the EPA, appointed without confirmation to a special adviser position. It is imperative that we keep our drinking water and our children safe, and send Dourson packing."http://www.commercialappeal.com/story/opinion/contributors/2017/11/23/protect-our-aquifer-politics-other-contaminants/886492001/ …

“When it comes to chemicals such as these, we need vigilant oversight and continued focus on regulations. The goal should be to keep people safe, but I worry that safety will not be Dourson’s priority.”http://www.pressherald.com/2017/11/08/letter-to-the-editor-collins-king-should-stand-against-trump-epa-pick/ …

"This isn’t about political ideology or whether you support or don’t support President Trump. This is about nothing less than the very basic safety of our drinking water."http://www.thetimesnews.com/opinion/20171114/editorial-epa-chemical-choice-bad-one …

"At a time when the EPA has newfound and much-needed authority to test chemicals under the nation’s updated toxics law, passed with bipartisan support just last year, why invite the fox into the henhouse?" The Senate must protect us from Dourson"http://www.mansfieldnewsjournal.com/story/opinion/readers/2017/11/26/letters-editor-sunday-nov-26/885136001/ …

"Putting Michael Dourson in charge of implementing this new law for the EPA would be like putting an arsonist in charge of the fire department, a walking, talking example of conflict of interest.”http://www.newsobserver.com/opinion/op-ed/article181973661.html …

"Last month I returned to Washington to wage my next fight against cancer, urging my senators to remember that cancer isn’t a partisan issue and chemical safety isn’t either. They must reject Dourson."http://www.idahostatesman.com/opinion/readers-opinion/article184911468.html …

"We recently went to Washington to ask our senators 'What if it was your child? How hard would you fight & what lengths would you go to protect not only your own, but all of our children?' “Dourson is a terrible and, we think, dangerous choice. A toxicologist by training, he has spent years as a consultant for chemical companies, arguing on their behalf for weaker safety standards.”http://www.starnewsonline.com/opinion/20171122/editorial-nov-22-burr-tillis-stand-up-for-safe-drinking-water …

"The notion of putting Dourson in charge of our chemical safety program is nothing less than absurd...families deserve to know that the products they buy and bring into our homes are safe. We simply cannot trust Dourson to keep our kids safe."
https://lasvegassun.com/news/2017/nov/20/pick-for-chemical-post-a-danger-to-our-health/ …

This disturbing timeline of events needs to be independently investigated. 
 
Until then, Chairman Pai should recuse himself from Sinclair-related business in order to protect the public interest, integrity and independence of the FCC's decision-making process.pic.twitter.com/RSAaw4hqfq

Quid pro quo? The basic timeline:
 
1. President-elect Trump meets with Sinclair’s CEO & reportedly discusses FCC rule changes.
 
2. Pai holds 3 meetings w/Sinclair.
 
3. @POTUS elevates Pai to FCC Chairman.
 
4. FCC repeatedly acts to ease rules to benefit Sinclair
 
Read more:pic.twitter.com/iIXAQ4laci

.@SenatorCantwell & I are deeply concerned with potential quid pro quo between the Trump administration, Sinclair & FCC Chairman Pai.

JFK said, "As we express our gratitude, we must never forget that the highest appreciation is not to utter words, but to live by them." Our veterans have honored their commitment, they kept their promise. We must keep ours—not just w/words on #VeteransDay, but w/actions every day

On #VeteransDay, we recommit to ensuring veterans have everything they need when they return to civilian life. No veteran should return home without a place to live, quality health care, or the training or education necessary to secure a job.

Today & every day, I'm honored to recognize the service, bravery, dedication and sacrifice of our veterans. I learn every day from the diverse voices, backgrounds and expertise on my staff—New Mexico benefits from their knowledge and experience. I’m proud to be a strong supporter of efforts to increase diversity in the halls of Congress.

Proper disposal saves lives and protects the environment. Join #takebackday: http://www.deadiversion.usdoj.gov/drug_disposal/takeback/ …
Don't forget! Today is #takebackday. Bring your unused #Rx meds to these local, anonymous sites: http://www.deadiversion.usdoj.gov/drug_disposal/takeback/ …
(4/4) Teens are using #Rx meds w/o knowing their danger, getting addicted & moving to heroin. And a troubling number are dying.
(3/4) The majority of people who die from #Rx overdoses are 44 to 64 yrs old. More women die from #Rx overdoses than illegal drugs.
(2/4) Illicit drug use of active duty service members has increased from 5% to 12% and is primarily attributed to #Rx abuse.
(1/4) Stats show that no community is exempted from the harms of #Rx abuse. #endmedicineabuse
In the last decade, #NM opioid sales increased 131% while #Rx overdose deaths increased nearly 62%. http://bit.ly/UEYgLq
Unused #Rx meds in houses can be stolen to sell on black mkt & used by ppl they weren't prescribed for. #takebackday: http://www.deadiversion.usdoj.gov/drug_disposal/takeback/ …
Even though they come from a doctor, #Rx drugs are no less addictive or dangerous than illegal drugs. #endmedicineabuse
WATCH, then share w/others this video about the real impact of medicine abuse on families & teenagers http://youtu.be/6SeqZs4tURI  #endmedicineabuse
70% of teens first get #Rx meds from family & friends, 5% from dealers or the internet. This epidemic is in our homes, not on the streets.
Law enforcement and health orgs agree. #Rx drugs that fall into the wrong hands are the most significant emerging drug threat in #NM.
I sit on the Senate Int'l Drug Caucus & spoke out on the #Rx epidemic in #NM at a recent hearing. WATCH: http://youtu.be/SrikGpx9iYQ
#Rx meds can't be tossed or flushed. #takebackday ensures pills are properly disposed.Locations in #NM,nationwide here http://www.deadiversion.usdoj.gov/drug_disposal/takeback/ …

#NM has the highest rate of #Rx overdose deaths in US. @NYTimes reported on this startling epidemic:http://www.nytimes.com/2012/06/09/us/in-new-mexico-battling-prescription-drug-use-that-leads-to-overdoses.html …
This Saturday, combat #Rx abuse by bringing unused meds to safe, anonymous locations throughout #NM for #takebackday: http://www.deadiversion.usdoj.gov/drug_disposal/takeback/ …
This week I'll be raising awareness of #Rx abuse. More #NM ppl die from pill overdoses than heroin/cocaine. RT to help me get the word out
